title: You're buffing Fiddle...really?
body: Like he can use a nerf, not a damn buff and extra cd refunding.... wtf... His damage is already too high. He is probably getting a skin soon so your making him stronger to sell more.....His kit is toxic

replies.body:
His kit is useless.

When was the last time anyone actually played fiddlesticks, outside trolling in blind pick or bronze V?
He just feels over all inconsequential to the game. The strongest thing in his kit is his fear and perhaps his sustain on w but it is still easily outbursted.
You can literally stand in his full ult not and barely take any damage...old Fiddle ult could 1 shot an entire team if placed properly.
OP is correct. Fears in general are toxic, and Fiddle is no exception to this. He was fine as is, but as usual Riot balance team has no clue what they're doing.

His W is easy to interrupt because he stands there like a sack of potatoes
You can move away from him when he is channeling his ult, so just ward a lot.

His Q is the only part of his kit that I find to be "toxic" in any way.

EDIT: Are you actually downvoting every comment here that doesn't agree with you? That's kind of sad.
Those buffs are not even that big lol.

Dude, stop posting threads. Everytime it's you complaining about ''x champion is OP plz nerf'' when the rest can clearly see this is a l2p issue. Fiddle and most champions that you are talking about are balanced and even in a weak state. Just because you can't deal with them does not mean they're OP. Just learn to counter them and they're really easy to beat them, which is why they need buffs.

Fiddle needing this buff aside, I think he is up for a kit rework but not because it's overpowered.

But because it's rather boring (except the ult).

Two of his three abilities are point-and-click while the third is a point-click-praytotheRNG. Riot was trying to avoid the praying aspect by adding the "dark wind prioritizes targets that are being drained" bit, but I don't think it's enough.

Riot has shown that they're systematically changing point-and-click kits to something more interactive with many of their reworks.
The fuck is this joke post?
Fiddle sticks is not even good right now lol he needs buffs
Sorry,but i agree with his buffs for one reason only.We will be able to see him in jungle more that trolling and feeding hard on mid like i have seen many times.
